p: Chitin and chitosan nanofillers can be isolated from Î±-chitin powder extracted from lobster wastes. The extraction of chitin and chitosan represents the possibility to revalorize the oceanic biomass and the revalorization of food extracts from the fishing industry. Lobster wastes are eco-friendly, renewable, sustainable, low cost, and biodegradable, with advantageous properties and with a significant value for packaging and biomedical applications.
